messages.title: Standing on a Record of Dedicated Hard Work
messages.content: Fiona obtained increased school funding for every pupil here and secured around £100million for Congleton Link Road and Middlewich Bypass to help reduce congestion, improve air quality & open up employment land for new jobs.

messages.title: Working with Hundreds of Community Groups
messages.content: Fiona successfully fought, over years, for the new Alsager Sports Hub - now open & set to benefit thousands of local people! Fiona works with and supports many local groups at grassroots level to improve our environment and community life.

messages.title: Being a Strong Voice on Your Priorities
messages.content: Fiona has listened to concerns and acted - e.g. to secure and improve local health services, like A&E, mental health & hospices; to support buyers of newbuilds against unfair developers' practices & called for better cycling & rail provision.

personalStories.story: Fiona obtained increased school funding for every pupil here and secured around £100million for Congleton Link Road and Middlewich Bypass to help reduce congestion, improve air quality & open up employment land for new jobs.

Fiona successfully fought, over years, for the new Alsager Sports Hub - now open & set to benefit thousands of local people! Fiona works with and supports many local groups at grassroots level to improve our environment and community life.

Fiona has listened to concerns and acted - e.g. to secure and improve local health services, like A&E, mental health & hospices; to support buyers of newbuilds against unfair developers' practices & called for better cycling & rail provision.

examples: A vote for Labour means another hung parliament. With Corbyn propped up by parties like the Scottish Nationalists. And they’re demanding ANOTHER referendum to break up Britain. That’s five long years of gridlock and uncertainty.
With Corbyn propped up by parties like the Scottish Nationalists.
